attributes.value:
Jenilee 
With 20/20 hindsight, I can now see every step led me to you.
A once in a multiverse primordial Arives to witness this cosmic conjunction,
proof our paths were signed in the stars long ago.
No walls, no armor—just us.
We don’t run or hide; we face every storm together.
if we ghost, it’s hand in hand,
exploring the infinite of our future.
With this truth before these witnesses,
I vow to unlock every moment with you… forever.
